property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an Aura or Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 red Spirit creature token with menace. At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each modified creature you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vehicles you control have crew 2. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some people test limits. I prefer to demolish them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, goad each creature your opponents control that's enchanted by an Aura you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on Kaima, the Fractured Calm for each creature goaded this way. (Until your next turn, the goaded creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater." Crew 8 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 8 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.) Shorikai, Genesis Engine can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Aerial Surveyor attacks, if defending player controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Crew 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the second night after the kami had drifted into town, the local general store was completely sold out of earplugs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ironsoul Enforcer or a commander you control attacks alone, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You break it, you buy it. You steal it, I find it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Destroy all nonartifact creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Technology evolves faster than a blade can swing." - Arima, lead inventor of the Futurists

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target opponent's graveyard. For each creature card exiled this way, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who have passed are beyond war, beyond suffering. Mourn them, envy them, but above all, remember them." - Light-Paws, Imperial advisor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature or Vehicle Enchanted permanent is a Vehicle artifact with crew 5 and it loses all other card types. (It's not a creature unless it's crewed.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On the bright side, the bear now had cupholders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Create X 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, where X is that spell's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Saiba Futurists guard their secret experiments with ever-evolving networks of cutting-edge defensive technology.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other artifact creatures you control have flying. When Cyberdrive Awakener enters the battlefield, until end of turn, each noncreature artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/4.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Imposter Mech enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature an opponent controls, except it's a Vehicle artifact with crew 3 and it loses all other card types. Crew 3

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best way to fight evil is with its own weapons.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{U}: Until end of turn, target noncreature artifact you control becomes an artifact creature and gains flying. If it's not a Vehicle, it has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target noncreature artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Futurists eagerly supplement their research with their rivals' closely guarded secrets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few outside the Saiba Futurists know the true extent of their data-extraction network.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more modified creatures you control attack, untap all modified creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles all creatures they own into their library. Each player who shuffled a nontoken creature into their library this way reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card, then puts that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a modified creature you control attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.) Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has menace. Whenever Komainu Battle Armor or equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, goad each creature that player controls. Reconfigure {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each of up to X target creatures, create a red Aura enchantment token named Smoke Blessing attached to that creature. Those tokens have enchant creature and "When enchanted creature dies, it deals 1 damage to its controller and you create a Treasure token."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals X damage to defending player, where X is the number of cards in their hand." When Unquenchable Fury is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ascendant Acolyte enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each +1/+1 counter among other creatures you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Ascendant Acolyte.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Limits exist solely to test the will."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, choose one or more - • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature with a counter on it. • Draw a card if you control an enchanted creature. • Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token if you control an equipped creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Kosei, Penitent Warlord is enchanted, equipped, and has a counter on it, Kosei has "Whenever Kosei, Penitent Warlord deals combat damage to an opponent, you draw that many cards and Kosei deals that much damage to each other opponent."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature you control Whenever enchanted creature or another modified creature you control dies, create X 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens, where X is that creature's power. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rampant Rejuvenator enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When Rampant Rejuvenator dies, search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is Rampant Rejuvenator's power, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures you control. Auras, Equipment, and modified creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Tanuki Transplanter or equipped creature attacks, add an amount of {G} equal to its power. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Reconfigure {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myojin of Blooming Dawn enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Blooming Dawn: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each permanent you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another legendary permanent enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Day after day he sat there, knowing that the Wanderer would soon be back for him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myojin of Cryptic Dreams enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Cryptic Dreams: Copy target permanent spell you control three times. (The copies become tokens.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myojin of Grim Betrayal enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Grim Betrayal: Put onto the battlefield under your control all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from anywhere this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ruthless Technomancer enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature you control. If you do, create a number of Treasure tokens equal to that creature's power. {2}{B}, Sacrifice X artifacts: Return target creature card with power X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. X can't be 0.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myojin of Roaring Blades enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Roaring Blades: It deals 7 damage to each of up to three targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever Go-Shintai of Life's Origin or another nontoken Shrine enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 colorless Shrine enchantment creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myojin of Towering Might enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Towering Might: Distribute eight +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control. They gain trample until end of turn.

property.value: Flying Whenever Aerial Surveyor attacks, if defending player controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Crew 2

(Until your next turn, the goaded creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vehicles you control have crew 2. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater." Crew 8 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 8 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.) Shorikai, Genesis Engine can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Vehicles you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate recruits its best pilots from the League of Aeronauts. Many go on to command entire fleets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vehicles you control become artifact creatures until end of turn. Choose a Dwarf you control. Attach any number of Equipment you control to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dwarves of Axgard seldom have reason to leave their impregnable underground kingdom - but when they do, they go in force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Cataclysmic Gearhulk enters the battlefield, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among the nonland permanents they control, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Exile target artifact. • Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature. Metalcraft - If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best presents are impossible to regift.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Metalcraft - Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every sword drawn to defend is an angelic blade, guided to justice by an angelic hand." - Auriok proverb

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, vigilance Whenever Parhelion II attacks, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance that are attacking. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The arc of my blade has carved a path of light for the peace that will follow."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestor saved us for a purpose."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, mill four cards. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn. −2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order. −8: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Art is unknown to the vedalken - for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. Goad each creature that had counters put on it this way. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once." - Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste, where X is this creature's power. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners. At the beginning of your end step, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Finding an unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After the people flee, but before the enemy arrives - that's grabbin' time."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ox of Agonas enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards. Escape - {R}{R}, Exile eight other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.) Ox of Agonas escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Shifting Shadow to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Starstorm deals X damage to each creature. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ever since the disaster, the city's survivors viewed the star-strewn sky with dread.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It fears no sword and leaves no bones behind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library. Genesis Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The predator knows the true way of the world. Life is conflict. Only the strong survive." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soul of Jukai reaches far beyond the forest's edge." - Shigeki, Jukai visionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each scar on its hide is a badge of honor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature your opponents control. When Primeval Protector enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth shook in support of their cause, offering a champion of its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rishkar, Peema Renegade enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. Each creature you control with a counter on it has "{T}: Add {G}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aether is the soul of Kaladesh, and all souls should be free."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Control the Great Conduit? You might as well try to divert a river with your hands."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He'd chosen a sunlit clearing with open skies and an ample brook. All that remained was to find a worthy sapling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each creature you control. Ferocious - You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of wisdom and strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few Nayans dare hunt the gargantuans. They're regarded not as animals but as forces of nature, like landslides or typhoons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Whiptongue Hydra enters the battlefield, destroy all creatures with flying. Put a +1/+1 counter on Whiptongue Hydra for each creature destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where'd all the birds go?" - Kaldrin, jungle sightseer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Arcanist's Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to X target artifact and/or non-Aura enchantment cards each with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If X is 6 or more, those permanents are 4/4 creatures in addition to their other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anarchy comes in many forms: social, individual, Gruul . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other non-Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Does it matter what it is? Take it and be grateful!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do." - Kresh the Bloodbraided

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying You may cast historic spells as though they had flash. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature spells you control can't be countered. Nontoken creatures you control have riot. (They enter the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some view Domri's unlikely ascent as a sign of Ilharg the Raze-Boar's imminent return.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one - • Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature. • Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law - strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: It spilled the blood of one elder dragon. In Gideon's hands, it may yet taste another's.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever Colossal Plow attacks, add {W}{W}{W} and you gain 3 life. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Crew 6 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 6 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you have that I cannot obtain?" - Mairsil, the Pretender

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Automaton inspectors ensure that the Consulate's stringent standards for mass production are upheld.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The leonin thought of the myr as omens, never imagining the sinister fate they foretold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Mirage Mirror becomes a copy of target artifact, creature, enchantment, or land until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most mirrors show your reflection. Others show your potential.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}: Another target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace? Its sole purpose is fear." - Saheeli Rai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Raiders' Karve attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash You may cast artifact spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It evades Phyrexians by hiding in the spaces between seconds.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Skysovereign, Consul Flagship enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Smuggler's Copter attacks or blocks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat . . . if you're prepared." - Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When wielded by a true believer, it matters little whether the sword is a relic or a replica.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Weatherlight deals combat damage to a player, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) Crew 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On the volcanic continent of Akoum, bizarre vegetation clusters around gas vents, and jagged mountain peaks rise high into the air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them." - Pulan, Bant orchardist

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped. When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The battle at Ganzan Pass left the land so saturated with blood and twisted kami magic that it was a century before a single blade of grass could take root.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Port Town enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Plains or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Port Town enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A haunted fog known as the Nebelgast shrouds the cities along Nephalia's coast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) Prairie Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The continent of Ondu is a vast plateau crisscrossed by deep trenches and meandering rivers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raging Ravine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {2}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Raging Ravine becomes a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Remote but always watching, the soaring city of Otawara moves over Kamigawa with a purpose that few understand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A beacon of prosperity to some, a shadow of oppression to others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.
